description: A Product or a Service that is bought, sold or kept in stock.

fields.description: If item is a variant of another item then description, image, pricing, taxes etc will be set from the template unless explicitly specified
fields.label: Variant Of

fields.description: Selecting "Yes" will give a unique identity to each entity of this item which can be viewed in the Serial No master.
fields.label: Has Serial No

fields.description:
Example: ABCD.#####
If series is set and Serial No is not mentioned in transactions, then automatic serial number will be created based on this series. If you always want to explicitly mention Serial Nos for this item. leave this blank.
fields.label: Serial Number Series
Allow over delivery or receipt upto this percent

fields.description: Automatically create Material Request if quantity falls below this level
fields.label: Re-order Level

fields.description: Will also apply for variants unless overrridden
fields.label: Reorder level based on Warehouse

fields.description: If this item has variants, then it cannot be selected in sales orders etc.
fields.label: Has Variants

fields.description: Average time taken by the supplier to deliver
fields.label: Lead Time in days

fields.description: Allow in Sales Order of type "Service"
fields.label: Is Service Item

fields.description: Items with higher weightage will be shown higher
fields.label: Weightage

fields.description: Show a slideshow at the top of the page
fields.label: Slideshow

fields.description: Show "In Stock" or "Not in Stock" based on stock available in this warehouse.
fields.label: Website Warehouse

fields.description: List this Item in multiple groups on the website.
fields.label: Website Item Groups

name: Item
